channel.title: Hi
channel.description:
Hey, i never did programming before. I'd like to learn and im wondering.. does it take lot of time to learn the coding language? Anyone have good website to suggest to learn that kind of stuff? :)
Thanks alot! (I Used the Search Button but... didnt find what i needed)
Btw im French so... english aint so good but well... think you get it

item.title: Hi
item.dc:creator: @meatstick meatstick
item.description:
@meatstick wrote:

Hey, this isn’t really the correct forum but i’ll give you some tips anyways.

I started with Java about 9-10 months ago, and im faaaaar away from being even good at it.

It’s very importnant that you read the Java coding conventions, as your sourcecode should always follow these.

http://java.sun.com/docs/codeconv/html/CodeConvTOC.doc.html

Also i’d suggest ‘Java for dummies’, I don’t really have a link for it but you can just google it.

Read full topic
